title: Read Me First
snippet: New to ChatGPT? This page explains what this site is and the fastest way to your first useful result.

title: Getting Started
snippet: Your first day with ChatGPT: three small wins and simple prompts that work.

title: How ChatGPT Works
snippet: Understand how the ChatGPT web app handles your messages, files, memory, and chat history—so you can drive better results.

title: Agentic Workflows Assessment - Everyday AI Guide
